text: Brian Athol Jordan (31 January 1932 – 27 December 2018) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for Rotherham United, Middlesbrough and York City, in non-League football for Denaby United, and was on the books of Derby County without making a league appearance. He died in 2018.OBITUARY | Brian Jordan 1932-2018 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Footballers from Doncaster Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Denaby United F.C. players Category:Rotherham United F.C. players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Brian Jordan (footballer)
